tool_description: Access GeoIQ-derived indices to get a social, economic, welfare and infrastructure overview of a location
name: Location Enrichment
title: Location Enrichment

api_list.name: /get_geoiq_indices
api_list.description: Location can be given as lat + lng, geohash, h3 index or an address. Geoiq indices provide insights on social, economic, welfare and infrastructural aspects of an area, calculated based on Geoiq's extensive data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://location-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com/get_geoiq_indices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://location-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com/get_geoiq_indices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
